column2: Counter offensive against Von Carsteins in [CustomCrisisVampireTarget]
Is not an Warmongering Nation, you are.

[FromFrom.GetDynName] having Ravaged the lands of [target_of_invasion.GetName], the discontent and displaced military of it's regime have started flocking to you, to help against the coming Hordes of Undeath.
The Lords in Duchy of [Prev.Duchy.GetName] are Susceptible for the Whims of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I shall make use of them
